sqlQuery.name: AllFileRecords
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct file_id ,filename, filepath, organism, build_num, category, file_type, file_format, filesize, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, 'Y' as matched_result FROM apidb.fileAttributes fa, sres.taxonName tn, apidb.organism o WHERE file_id in ($$fileparamIds$$) AND organism = tn.name AND o.abbrev IN ($$organism_select_all_sequences$$) AND tn.taxon_id = o.taxon_id ORDER BY build_num, organism, file_format

sqlQuery.name: FileRecordsByID
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT file_id FROM apidb.fileAttributes WHERE file_id in ($$fileIds$$)
